name: Maureen Thorson
bio: Maureen Thorson was born in Rhode Island and grew up in the American South. She is the author of the full-length poetry collections My Resignation (Shearsman, 2014) and Applies to Oranges (Ugly Duckling Presse, 2011), as well as the chapbooks The Woman, The Mirror, the Eye (Bloof Books, 2015) and Mayport (Poetry Society of America, 2006). She lives in Maine.
